item.description:
'The Fathers' Corner', runs every Tuesday, 6:00-6:30 p.m., on Boston Cable, Channels 9 (Comcast) & 15 (RCN).

Viewing online streaming is possible at www.bnntv.org . SEE BELOW

We are interviewing candidates for Boston City Council and for Mayor of Boston over the next two months. Tuesday's guest is Scotland Willis, candidate for Boston City Councilor-at-Large and single father.

Please show your support and educate the candidates about our issues by calling into the show on 1-617-708-3290.

'The Fathers' Corner'
Tuesday, 6:00PM

TO VIEW THE PROGRAM LIVE ONLINE:
Go to www.bnntv.org

Option #1:
Under "What's On Now, News & Information Channel Comcast 9/ RCN 15, Watch a
Live Stream"- double click the media player.

If this fails:

Option #2:
Right click 'Windows Media", select "Save Target As" > 'Save">"Open Folder"
and then double click the downloaded media (channel-9.asx) file


Some of the past shows:

July 7 with Ego Ezedi, candidate for Boston City Council
http://blip.tv/file/2...

June 30 with Greg Sabine
http://blip.tv/file/2...

June 16 with Bob Norton
http://blip.tv/file/2...

April 21 with Earl Sholley
http://blip.tv/file/2...

group.name: Greater Boston Chapter of The Fatherhood Coalition

item.name: "The Fathers' Corner"- July 21
